Name: Meteor Crush VR
About the game: In the 2083 AD, a giant asteroid hit Mars and destroying the planet. The debris are heading towards our planet and threaten its existence. Crush their advance and prevent the meteorites to crash into our planet. Use your controllers to hit the meteors and crush them Be careful though, the longer you play the faster they become Each meteoroid that passes you will reduce your HP Be prepared for fast paced arcade style gameplay with unlimited playtime, great music and sound effects Compare your score online and become the best meteor crusher for our planet.
